title.en: Don't Call Javotte an Evil Stepsister

altTitles.en: Don't Call Jabot Your New Sister

altTitles.ja: ジャヴォットを意地悪な姉と呼ばないで

altTitles.vi: Đừng gọi Javotte là chị kế

altTitles.th: ข้าไม่ใช่พี่สาวใจร้ายสักหน่อย!

description.de:
Javotte Wincheston hat für die Männer, die ihrer jüngeren Stiefschwester anzüglich hinterherstarren, nichts als böse Blicke übrig. Ja, es stimmt schon, dass sie sich in der Vergangenheit nicht wirklich um Cinciarell gekümmert hat. Aber seit diese sie mit einem Schlag wie durch ein Wunder aus dem Koma erweckt hat, ist sie ihr ans Herz gewachsen. Javotte ist nun fest entschlossen, ihrer Rolle als Erbin von Haus Wincheston gerecht zu werden und die wahre Herrin des Hauses zu werden. Mit der Hilfe ihres neuen, mysteriösen Liebhabers aus dem nahe gelegenen Kaiserreich versucht sie, das sterbende Familienunternehmen wiederzubeleben. Doch ihre Mutter, die immer so wohlwollend und fürsorglich war, scheint nicht die Absicht zu haben, das zuzulassen. Wird es Javotte gelingen, dem Namen Wincheston seinen früheren Glanz zurückzugeben und herauszufinden, welche Geheimnisse ihre Mutter verbirgt?

---

description.en:
At the age of 19, I, Zabotte Winchester, inherited the legacy of my stepfather and became the owner of the Winchester family. I thought my mother would run the family, so I could live a comfortable life. When I found out I might die from a car accident, I rewrote my life plan.

"From now on, I will be the real owner of Winchester."

I will protect Winchester's wealth and honor, the future of my old and new sisters, and win the loyalty of a man who was the start the night at a ball all by himself.

"Miss Winchester, I will only tell you. Actually, my real identity…"

"Shh. Keep your secret, Merrick. The only thing I care about is a man's kind heart.”

“…But why have you been touching my thigh since a while ago?"

"Don't get me wrong. I was exploring where the man's heart comes from."

She has a little temper, but it turns out she's a caring older sister.

---
Javotte Wincheston shoots a venomous glare at the men leering at Cinciarell in the ballroom. Yes, it's true that she didn't really care for her younger stepsister in the past. But ever since Cinciarell miraculously woke her up from a coma by body slamming her, Javotte has had a soft spot for her stepsister. Javotte is now determined to step up as House Wincheston's heir and become the true head of the household. With the help of her new, mysterious lover from the empire, she struggles to find ways to revive the dying family business. But her mother, who has always been so benevolent and caring, seems to have no intention of letting that happen. Will Javotte be able to restore the Wincheston name to its former glory and find out what sort of secrets her mother is hiding?

---

description.fr:
Javotte Wincheston n’avait jamais vraiment pris soin de sa demi-sœur Cinciarell, surnommée «Cendrillon.» Mais depuis que cette dernière l’a miraculeusement réveillée d’un étrange coma, Javotte commence à ressentir une certaine tendresse envers elle. Elle se met alors en travers du chemin de tout homme qui tenterait de séduire Cinciarell dans la salle de bal, bien décidée à protéger celle qu’elle considère maintenant comme une vraie sœur. Egalement déterminée à assumer son nouveau statut d’héritière de la maison Winchester, elle compte bien prendre les choses en main pour restaurer les affaires peu fructueuses de la famille, grâce à l’aide d’un mystérieux amant venu de l’Empire. Mais sa mère, qui était pourtant autrefois si bienveillante, n’a pas l’air d’avoir l’intention de la laisser faire. Javotte finira-t-elle par découvrir les secrets cachés de sa mère et à raviver la gloire passée de la famille?

---

description.ja:
ジャヴォット姉様は、本当はとても優しいのですよ？

私「ジャヴォット・ウィンジェストン」は、19歳で義父の財産を相続しウィンチェストン家の主人となった。

だけど、「家のことはお母様がやってくれるだろうから、私は一生ダラダラ気楽に生きればいいんだよね」 …と喜んでいたところで、死の危機に直面してしまう。

そこで、人生のプランを組み直すことにした。

「これからはこの私が、ウィンチェストン家の本当の主人になる！」

ウィンチェストンの富も名誉も、私の妹たちの将来も、 舞踏会で一夜を熱く過ごした彼との義理も、全てこの手で守って見せる！

---

description.ko:
[소설]자보트를 새 언니라고 부르지 마세요 못된 새 언니는 가라, 걸크러쉬 뿜뿜 신상 언니가 떴다! 새 언니는 나쁘다고?! no no~ 신개념 새 언니 등장! 시골 출신 자보트는 웅장한 대저택 윈체스턴의 딸이 된다. 하지만 자보트는 재산을 상속받게 된 직후, 누군가에 의해 독살 위험에 처한다. 이때 자보트는 이복 자매인 신시아렐의 순수한 마음을 알게 된다. 간신히 살아난 자보트는 무도회에서 수수께끼의 제국 청년 멜릭을 만나게 된다. 이를 계기로 자보트는 우연히 경영 스승을 만나고, 공부를 하며 엄마에게 맡겨둔 집안의 경영상태가 엉망이라는 것을 깨닫는데…

---

description.th:
ยามข้าถูกลอบวางยาพิษจนเกือบตาย ไม่มีใครในครอบครัวคิดจะช่วยชีวิตข้าเลยสักคน ยกเว้นซินเธียเรลลูกสาวของพ่อเลี้ยงที่พยายามช่วยชีวิตข้าอย่างเต็มที่ ดีล่ะ ในเมื่อข้าฟื้นขึ้นมาแล้ว งั้นต่อจากนี้ข้าจะไม่เป็นพี่สาวใจร้ายอีกต่อไป!

description.vi:
Sau khi mẹ tái hôn với một quý tộc, cuộc đời của hai chị em Javotte và Wishful đã bước sang một trang mới. Cha dượng đối xử với ba cô con gái công bằng như nhau, vì thế chị cả Javotte dù không phải con ruột nhưng nghiễm nhiên trở thành người thừa kế gia tộc Winchester. Cứ ngỡ mẹ sẽ thay mình lèo lái gia tộc, còn mình chỉ việc ăn chơi hưởng thụ, nhưng sau khi trải qua một tai nạn suýt chết, Javotte mới nhận ra "gia đình" này không như mình nghĩ. Cô em gái Cinderella mà Javotte từng căm ghét lại là người duy nhất muốn cứu cô, còn người mẹ và người em gái ruột mà cô tin tưởng lại nhẫn tâm nhìn cô đi vào chỗ chết. Sau khi chết hụt một lần, Javotte quyết định viết lại một cuộc đời mới. Lần này cô quyết tâm sẽ bảo vệ bản thân và những người mình yêu thương bằng chính sức của mình.

---

description.zh:
乡下姑娘吉宝特摇身一变成为家族继承人，却在宴会上惨遭被人下毒，身处危险境地的她意外发现原来自己身边原本是亲人的母亲是那么的陌生，而只有家族关系的妹妹灰姑娘却对自己关怀备至，艰难活下来的吉宝特终于开始策划了自己的人生，她要做这个家族的真正女主人！
